block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This Spinning Star designed by Paolo Bascetta could really spin! This is a modular origami model made out of 8 sheets of square paper. It is easy to fold. Try it out. Learn it in less than a minute! Enjoy!!! Thanks For Watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art

meta_description: Heap Art Origami tutorial, How to fold Spinning Star by Paolo Bascetta
meta_keywords: Heap Art Origami Tutorial, Heap Art, origami, tutorial, video, how to, short video, vertical video, spinning star by paolo bascetta, Paolo Bascetta
